body.name: King Bed Frame with Adjustable Headboard Upholstered Bed Frame Platform Linen Fabric Headboard Wooden Slats Support/No Box Spring Needed/Easy Assembly/Mattress Foundation, Grey

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Upholstered Bed Frame】The surface of the whole bed frame is crafted with high-quality linen fabric which is skin friendly. When you touch the fabric with your fingers, you will find it so soft and comfortable. Bed frame headboard made of high quality linen fabric, wrapped in high elastic memory foam and it will offer you more comfortable relax time when leaning against it and then reading books or watching TV in bed.

【No Box Spring Needed】 Mattress slats are made of sturdy hardwood to support life of mattress and allow for less sagging for both inner-spring and memory foam mattresses. Mattress can be put on the slats directly, you can save money on box springs. The tufted adjustable headboard can be adjusted in a height range of 35 to 39 inches, allows you to use 8-14 inch mattresses.

【Easily Assemble】In order to reduce the difficulty and save the time of installation, we simplify the installation of the wooden slat system and provide detailed instructions. You just need 1 minute to finish the slat system using the hook&loop slats with velcro design and only need to spend less than 60 minutes to complete the whole bed frame following the instructions.

【Modern Design】The simple and elegant design of the bed is perfect for any home decoration style, you can put them in your bedroom and then have a good rest, enjoy your night. Overall dimension: 82.7"L x 78.3"W x 35/37/39"H. Headboard dimension: 63"L x 23.6"W . Fit perfectly for a mattress: 8-14 inches.
【CONTACT US】Login to your amazon account > choose "Your orders"> find the order ID > click"Contact seller".

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sparkle Point Height Adjustable Headboard Easily Fast Assemble
Previous page Next page 1 Grey 2 Light Grey 3 Beige

Upholstered Headboard The upholstered headboard is filled with high-density thicker sponge, you will enjoy more comfortable relax time when leaning against it. High-quality Fabric The surface of the whole bed frame is crafted with the unique fabric,it is soft, skin friendly and breathble, offer you really comfortable experience. Solid Wood Slats Ten solid wood support slats which are made of hardwood allow a strong load-bearing capacity, suitable for a long time use of a family. Strong Support Feet Strong hardwood was used to produce the heavy-duty support feet, when you lying or sitting in bed, you will be surprised at how solid it is.

Specifications Color Grey/Light Grey/Beige Size Full/Queen Material Fabric&Metal&Wood Box Spring Required No Assembly Required Yes Wood Slats Support Yes Mattress Height 8''-12'' Weight Capacity 800lbs Box Spring Includes No Package Includes Bed Frame/Headboard

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together. Comes with all the needed tools. Sturdy and elegant . It's a great investment . You won't go wrong with this purchased .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was very skeptical about purchasing a $90 before but I'm pleasantly surprised by the quality and sturdiness of the bed. It was easy and quick to assemble but you definitely need a drill for 2 of the holes that are not predrilled. I like that youre able to adjust the height of the headboard. It's a very simple design and nothing fancy but it's perfect for my guest bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just got done setting up the bed frame. Good instructions. However some of the holes on the head board and the legs where crooked. Which caused the boards that support the mattress to not fit correctly. They call the boards the slat set. Some of them I had to lay over the side rails, instead on on the support rails that they provide. I guess if you have the right tools, you can make your own holes, so that you won't have a crooked bed. I do like the material and color. The legs are also sturdy. I tried to upload pictures, but not savvy with my permission settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good bed frame
reviews.reviewText: this is a nice bed frame. at first I was worried that it is not sturdy enough but been using it for weeks and didn't see any problem. it could have been better if headboard is a little bit thicker and taller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent value and nice appearance
reviews.reviewText: I wanted some nicer than the basic metal frame. A reviewer said it had a low clearance (6 1/4") making cleaning difficult. Besides the 3 legs on each side, the king frame also has 12 legs underneath. While this gives outstanding support, a good floor cleaning means moving the bed. The headboard is the first assembly step, but be sure what height you want as repositioning it after putting it together is a royal pain (voice of experience). If you don't want any space between the mattress and headboard you will need at least an 11" thickness.Assembly instructions were very good and the way the fasteners were packaged made using the wrong bolt almost fool proof. They said assembly would be under an hour, but it took me just over two hours putting the king frame together (not counting moving the headboard). I'm pretty good with this type of thing, worked at a good pace, and didn't encounter any problems.I really like its appearance, and despite the floor cleaning issue am very satisfied with the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Masochists Only*** Not worth garbage wood
reviews.reviewText: Terrible. Most expensive and cheapest made bed I've ever bought (young person). This bed makes Walmart look like Ikea. If you're broke, go find a second hand bed that's still around because this thing will break before you replace your mattress. Seriously. The cheapest frame at Walmart is leagues ahead of this frame.2hr build solo (man). A few notes, the wood is raw plywood. Yes, I got splinters. Yes, it arrived with cracks in the wood. Yes, the instructions direct you to screw screws into the plywood with a bent off screwdriver. That took the life out of me - use a real screwdriver. There was no reason for that. They should have been Allen bolts like the rest of the build, but no, you get to try and screw into 2inch of wood with zero leverage or grip. Enjoy.Inconsistencies... God. Side legs are uneven because the side supports are different heights - go figure. Base legs screw way past the end of the wood slats because the washers are set at different heights (see pics).Not linen fabric. It is polyester and it smells like absolutely rank chemicals.Don't buy this if you want a wood frame. The un-sanded wood will tear up your mattress. Just take the metal frame. It will be so much easier to set up and tear down, and it will last 10x longer than this hot piece of garbage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap price. Decent quality. It’ll do!
reviews.reviewText: Went together fairly easily. The frame didn’t square up quite right, so it took some convincing of the brackets to flex the frame to my will. The fabric has this awful smell of cheap dye and the warehouse it was made at. It is definitely sturdy enough to handle the occasional use in my guest bedroom. Sits very low to the ground, and without a box spring there is a large gap between mattress and headboard. You can adjust the headboard down the legs by repositioning the bolt pattern, or add a box spring to fill the gap. I’m opting for the box spring to increase the distance from the ground, cause as it is right now you are so low you climb out of bed which isn’t all that fun first thing in the morning. Overall though, it’s nice looking, and serves the purpose for the space. Hopefully it holds up over time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Forgot to take a picture before we put the mattress and bedding on, but we love this bed frame! It’s really sturdy, the headboard is comfy, and it took maybe two hours to put together? Instructions were clear, and everything was labeled really well.
